title: Investment opportunity from Battaramulla
details:
An Investment opportunity from one of the fastest developing administrative city Battaramulla.

Main road facing property and it's a 3 storied building.

- 3000 sq ft. ( 1000 sqft each floor)
- 3 phase power supply
- Parking for 5 Cars
- Fully Tiled with complete bathrooms on each floor.
- Currently leased , can be transferred with the tenant

Contact for more details and appointments
